card.title: Living Water: The Gospel of John

metadata.author: Kaleidoscope
metadata.description:
Kaleidoscope is reimagining kids' Bibles for children of all ages. In beautifully retold single-volumes, we make the whole story of the Bible come alive for kids of all ages using language they can easily understand.

From Genesis to Revelation, get ready to experience the Bible in a whole new way!

translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: We’ve frozen this link because it may be breaking our <1>sharing policy</1>. The playlist’s creator can email hello@yotoplay.com to request a manual review.

translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Aïe, aïe, aïe… Ça, on ne l’avait pas prévu !
